name: Mixtures
description:
As an alarm rings out throughout the lab, you as a scientist must traverse through and find the source of it. Luckily for you, you have 3 potions to help on your way, each giving you different abillites.

These potions can however be mixed at any time to create new stronger potions with new better abillites. Just don't mix all 3 of them together...

This game was created in one week for the Brackeys Game Jam - 2021.1 with the theme of "Stronger Together." This is my first game jam I've ever joined!

Huge thanks to HYPRCCRY for making the fantastic music.

https://hyprcrry.itch.io/

As well as Miguel Cintra for creating all the great sound effects!

https://3g-ghost-pro.itch.io/
https://twitter.com/CintraMiguel

And of course thanks to Brackeys and the Brackeys team and thank you for checking out my game.

Controls: 

M to Mute Music, and R to Restart.

A and D or Left and Right Arrow Keys to move.

Space, W, or Up Arrow to jump.

And 8, 9, 0 to select and deselect potions and Y to use your currently mixed one. (Having four seperate fingers for these keys is reccomended.)
